content: I still had some remarks, but I failed miserably to tell bors that it should wait a second.
Can we somehow transfer the comments to a new PR? Or reopen this PR? I don't actually know what the best practice is here.
@Scott Morrison @Devon Tuma

I can see the comments still, so I could go ahead and fix them in a new branch and create a new PR? Might be a bit weird since the comments won't be on the actual PR I'm opening, but unmerging a branch sounds even weirder in my mind.
I think a new branch and PR is right.
I added a comment too (a new file was created without a module doc string).
